welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: Cloud Storage
welcome.description: Reliable and convenient cloud storage for your files with unlimited access from anywhere in the world.

auth.name: Name
auth.passwordMinLength: The password must contain at least 8 characters
auth.passwordMaxLength: The password must contain no more than 16 characters
auth.passwordPattern: The password must not contain spaces

accordion.title: How to create an account?
accordion.body: To create an account, go to the registration page and fill out all the required fields, including name, email and password.

accordion.title: How to upload files?
accordion.body: After logging into your account, go to the 'Home' page, select the desired folder, or create one if it does not exist.

accordion.title: How to share files?
accordion.body: To share a file, select it and click 'Make public'

accordion.title: How do I change my password?
accordion.body: To change your password, go to 'Settings', and click 'Change Password'.

accordion.title: How to contact the developer?
accordion.body: In my Github profile you can find links for communication: w01f-o

errors.mailer_error: An error occurred while sending the letter.
errors.user_with_such_email_already_exists: A user with this email already exists
errors.user_with_such_email_not_found: User with this email was not found

error.create: An error occurred while creating the folder
error.update: An error occurred while updating the folder
error.delete: An error occurred while deleting a folder

folders.title: Creating a folder

delete.warning: All attached files will be deleted

delete.confirm: To confirm, enter the folder name below and click the button

empty.title: You don't have folders yet
empty.description: Click the button below to create

activation.title: Account activation
activation.description: To continue working, you need to activate your account - enter the activation code sent to your email below
activation.error: There was an error activating your account
